title: AIKa R-16: Virgin Mission
synopsis: Aika is a smart and athletic high school girl. She is so competent that she successfully passes the salvagers license test, obtaining a C-class license. Yet, she is young and hotheaded, so much so that Gota still treats her as a child. Due to this personality, no one is willing to hire her for salvaging jobs.
characters: ['Sumeragi, Aika', 'Shinkai, Eri', 'Minamino, Karen', 'Risako, Nagisa', 'Turbulence, Gust', 'Captain', 'Aida, Gozo']
